entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
